entry.title: Former EverQuest Lead: Games Must Be Co-Created With Players
entry.summary: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler says that the future of gaming, including the metaverse, will require players to co-create and be rewarded for it.

entry.title: Not Just Nvidia: These Are the Other Big Winners in the AI Chip Biz
entry.summary: COVID-19 was hell for tech stock and chip manufacturers. But AI has now flipped the script. Here are the companies benefiting the most so far.

entry.title: JP Morgan Files Patent for ChatGPT Finance Clone, IndexGPT
entry.summary: The bot would give financial advice on securities, investments, and monetary affairs.

entry.title: EverQuest Producer Jeffrey Butler on How Ready Player One Led Him to Web3 Project Avalon
entry.summary: Jeffrey Butler started his game development career producing EverQuest. Now, he's Avalon's Chief Product Officer. Butler told Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he wants to create a customizable world where users can create their own worlds and in-game content.

entry.title: There's Now a Dollar-Backed Stablecoin on Bitcoin Using Ordinals Protocol
entry.summary: Stably debuted Stably USD in 2019. It's got a $7 million market capitalization across 11 blockchains, according to its April attestation.

entry.title: Grand Theft Auto 6 Crypto Rumors Are Swirling Again—Here’s What’s Going On
entry.summary: Rumors suggest that Rockstar Games' anticipated Grand Theft Auto 6 will feature cryptocurrency. Is there any truth to the claims?

entry.title: Esports Orgs Should Become More Like Tech Companies: Community Gaming CEO
entry.summary: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP conference organizer Chris Gonsalves believes crypto and tech could rejuvenate and reinvent the esports industry. In an interview, he tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why he thinks esports organizations should shake up their approach.

entry.title: European Securities Regulator Raises Concerns Over Crypto Products Ahead of MiCA Rollout
entry.summary: Despite the adoption of MiCA, ESMA said today firms must still label crypto offerings as unregulated until the framework is implemented.

entry.title: Binance Expects to Launch New Thai Crypto Exchange in Q4 2023
entry.summary: After landing a crypto operator's license in Thailand today, Binance Gulf is expected to open its doors at the end of this year.

entry.title: Ethereum, Bitcoin Balances on Exchanges Edges Toward 5-Year Low
entry.summary: The collapse of FTX, the rise in self-custody interest, and Ethereum’s latest upgrade appear to be fueling the latest exchange exodus.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Gemini Turns to Ireland for European Headquarters
entry.summary: Amid increasing regulatory pressure in the U.S., the Winklevoss twins see the Emerald Isle as an “entry point” into the rest of Europe.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Hold Ground as $3.5 Billion in Options Expire
entry.summary: With billions in Bitcoin and Ethereum options expiring today, analysts expected the worst.

entry.title: What's the Environmental Impact of Generative AI Tools?
entry.summary: Will ChatGPT and other generative AI tools make an outsized impact on the planet? Maybe—but there's reason for optimism, too.

entry.title: Ordinals Is Drawing Former Ethereum Devs to Build on Bitcoin
entry.summary: The buzzy Bitcoin protocol is attracting talent from across the Web3 ecosystem.

entry.title: Ubisoft's Rabbids Invade Reddit as Free NFTs
entry.summary: Reddit released a limited quantity of free Rabbids avatar NFTs and users are scooping them up, with multiple varieties already depleted.

entry.title: Mojo Melee Game Preview: Hands-on With the Casual Web3 Auto Battler
entry.summary: Mojo Melee is an auto battler game that offers Polygon NFTs. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin playtested the game in beta and offers his thoughts on the gameplay experience.

entry.title: No Virginia, Ron DeSantis's Campaign Didn't Alter His Video With AI
entry.summary: They used good old-fashioned digital editing tools instead.

entry.title: Mojo Melee Puts a Casual Spin on Teamfight Tactics-Style Auto Battlers
entry.summary: PREVIEW: The NFT-infused Mojo Melee is simple in its beta state, but that makes it a good introduction to a complex genre.

entry.title: Governments Need to 'Move Faster' on AI Rules, Says Microsoft President
entry.summary: Microsoft President Brad Smith is the latest tech leader to call for government AI regulation, but says companies have a role too.

entry.title: Panic Over $1.5 Billion DeFi Bridge Multichain Shifts to Fantom
entry.summary: Multichain has issued 35% of Fantom's assets, including 80% of its total stablecoin market cap, according to research firm Thanefield Capital.

entry.title: What Happens to Bitcoin and Ethereum If the US Defaults on Its Debt?
entry.summary: The U.S. has never defaulted before. Interestingly, Bitcoin and Ethereum have seen more losses than stocks after a warning from Janet Yellen.

entry.title: Passing Fad? Bitcoin Ordinals Inscriptions Just Hit a New Milestone
entry.summary: The number of Bitcoin Ordinals—which includes NFTs and meme tokens—continues to surge, with supporters calling it a catalyst for adoption.

entry.title: Roman Coppola: ‘A New Tarantino or Kubrick’ Could Come From Web3 Film World
entry.summary: Coppola’s Web3 fund Decentralized Pictures aims to democratize the filmmaking process, fostering an inclusive platform for fresh talent.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Lose Steam Amid Ledger Controversy and US Market Uncertainty
entry.summary: Gaming tokens RNDR and SAND have seen impressive gains in the past day. Meanwhile, meme coin PEPE has lost 11% in the past week.

entry.title: Government Sanctions on Tornado Cash Don't Fit The Law: Coinbase Legal Officer
entry.summary: Coinbase's Chief Legal Officer argues that the government's reasoning for sanctioning the Ethereum mixer is dangerously flawed.

entry.title: 3XP Gaming Expo Showcases Upcoming Web3 Titles
entry.summary: Dozens of upcoming Web3 titles are joining gamers, developers and Twitch streamers at the upcoming gaming event.

entry.title: Sam Altman’s Worldcoin Raises $115 Million in Round Led by Blockchain Capital
entry.summary: Worldcoin developers Tools for Humanity say the Series C fundraise will support research, development, and growing the ecosystem.

entry.title: What is SmarDex? The DeFi Disruptor Poised to Take Over the DEX Market
entry.summary: SmarDex is a new DEX that uses fictive reserves and a smart calculation system to automatically determine which token is rising faster.

entry.title: Binance Suspends Multichain Token Deposits Amid Transaction Delays
entry.summary: Days-long delays for transactions on Multichain now mean Binance has taken action to suspend several linked bridges.

entry.title: Nvidia Stock Soars Double-Digits Following Revenue Uptick Amid AI Frenzy
entry.summary: Chip manufacturer Nvidia boasted a large uptick in revenues last quarter thanks to the latest developments in the world of AI.

entry.title: Crypto Leverage ‘Is Only a Problem’ When it Impacts Traditional Finance: EU Watchdog
entry.summary: EU advisors say there’s little connection between crypto and TradFi for now, but caution the industry should still be closely monitored.

entry.title: Reddit the Only Big Tech Firm That 'Cracked the NFT Code': Polygon Co-founder
entry.summary: Polygon co-founder applauded Reddit’s success in onboarding millions of users to crypto during a wide-ranging discussion.

entry.title: Decentraland Metaverse Pride Event Aims to Spur 'Real Change, One Avatar at a Time'
entry.summary: The three-day Metaverse Pride 2023 celebration will offer educational experiences and live musical performances, with a focus on community.

entry.title: Crypto Consortium Fahrenheit Wins Bid to Acquire Bankrupt Celsius' Assets
entry.summary: Troubled crypto lending company Celsius Network has made a significant step towards exiting from bankruptcy.

entry.title: OpenAI Could Exit Europe Amid Regulatory Pressure: Reuters
entry.summary: The EU AI Act would require companies to disclose copyrighted materials used in AI development.

entry.title: Apple Takes Its 30% Bite From AI Innovation, Costing OpenAI Millions
entry.summary: Apple may not be breaking boundaries in AI, but its firm grasp on the app market allows it to share in the success of those who are.

entry.title: Ron DeSantis Tells Elon Musk Bitcoin Will Die If Joe Biden Is Reelected
entry.summary: His comments came toward the end of a technically challenged Twitter Spaces conversation.

entry.title: Magic Eden Will Pay You to Buy and Sell Solana NFTs
entry.summary: The leading Solana NFT marketplace will play nicer with other platforms and offer a bonus on certain trades.

entry.title: Ron DeSantis Twitter Spaces Event Experiences 'Rapid Unscheduled Disassembly'
entry.summary: Crypto Twitter has thoughts on the catastrophic failure of the live audio event, along with everyone else.

entry.title: Illuvium Overworld Blends Open World Adventure With Pokémon-Style Battling—And It's Beautiful
entry.summary: PREVIEW: We go hands-on with one of Illuvium's game modes, which pairs stunning-looking exploration with creature combat.

entry.title: Meta Is Training Its AI on the Bible and Other Religious Texts
entry.summary: For its artificial intelligence speech tool, Meta is processing over 4,000 languages with the aim of preservation.

entry.title: OpenAI Beats Elon Musk to Market: AI Humanoid Robots Are Already Taking Your Jobs
entry.summary: Nurse by day and bartender by night, these AI-powered robots are giving a whole new meaning to multi-tasking, stepping out of science fiction and into the real world.

entry.title: How 3XP Plans to Reshape Crypto's Reputation Among Gamers
entry.summary: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP organizer Chris Gonsalves tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the first 3XP video game conference, which aims to bring together fans of crypto-enabled video games, influencers, game developers, blockchain firms, and gamers under one roof in Pasadena, California from June 8-9, 2023.

entry.title: Mark Otero Shares Why a16z Invested in Azra Games' Approach to Gaming
entry.summary: What is Azra Games' approach to NFTs in gaming? Azra Games CEO Mark Otero shares his vision and why he believes his approach was a key reason Azra received investment from venture capital firms like Andreessen Horowitz (a16z).

entry.title: Funding Web3 Film Calladita With Traditional Systems 'Wasn't Working', Says Director Miguel Faus
entry.summary: Spanish Film Director Miguel Faus talks with Decrypt about how he financed his movie “Calladita” with NFTs. In his view, Web3 and blockchain allow creators to get around some of the key difficulties present in the traditional movie industry, specifically finding funding.

entry.title: 'Web3 Offers Something Hollywood Does Not': Film3 Pioneer, Filmmaker Jordan Bayne
entry.summary: Film3 pioneer, Metacannes and The Squad founder, Jordan Bayne discusses the advantages that crypto offers to filmmakers, notably owning their work's IP throughout the entire creation, production, and distribution processes.

entry.title: Film3 Offers 'a Whole Bunch of Independent Filmmakers' Hope, Says First Flights Co-founder Nick Sadler
entry.summary: First Flights co-founder Nick Sadler sat down with Decrypt at this year's MetaCannes festival to discuss how Web3 can support independent filmmakers by leveraging its unique blockchain-powered crowdfunding platform.

entry.title: The Film3 Movement 'Doesn't Need Competitors, it Needs Collaborators': Bingeable CEO, Founder Stephen Murray
entry.summary: Founder and CEO of Bingeable Stephen Murray unpacks how creators and filmmakers can lower the barriers for audiences to connect with their work. "Within two clicks on hearing about the movie, you're watching it," he told Decrypt at this year's MetaCannes festival.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: Defining The Web3 Stack
entry.summary: In this video, part of Infura’s Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn how to define the web3 stack in order to build full stack decentralized applications. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at ConsenSys.

entry.title: 'Web3 Creates a Tighter Bond' Between Audiences, Creators: MyCo CCO
entry.summary: MyCo’s streaming platform CCO Phil McKenzie talks with Decrypt about the Film3 movement and the Metacannes festival he helped to organize occurring alongside the Festival de Cannes. He explains how Web3 can help creators to find funding and create new ways to interact with the audience.

entry.title: Immutable's Chris Clay: Crypto Can Solve the 'Dreaded Rollback' in MMORPGs
entry.summary: Immutable VP and Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how Immutable is actually immutable—and how that changes everything for both developers and players.

entry.title: Gary Vee Discusses the Rise and Impact of AI
entry.summary: During VeeCon 2023, entrepreneur spoke with Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about the rise of AI tools, what excites him about the technology, and what kind of impact he thinks it will have on creators and business.

entry.title: Gary Vee Discusses VeeCon 2023's Broader Shift Beyond Web3
entry.summary: VeeCon is back in 2023, moving from Minneapolis to Indianapolis, and creator and entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk joined Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss his aim to make it the "coolest business conference in the world." And that means expanding the focus beyond NFTs and Web3 to include AI and other tech innovations, along with broader business and pop culture content.

entry.title: Gary Vee on the NFT Market and Why 'NFTs Are Stuffed Animals'
entry.summary: Gary Vaynerchuk called the NFT market decline back in 2021, but the owner of CryptoPunks and other valuable tokenized assets still believes that a sustainable market will eventually form. He joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward amid VeeCon 2023 to discuss why he thinks the NFT space will be comparable to collectible sports cards, art, and even stuffed animals.

entry.title: What Immutable's Chris Clay Learned in 23 Years of Game Development
entry.summary: Immutable VP & Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what it's like to work in the game industry for decades and why he's not giving up on NFT games.

entry.title: Why Azra Games CEO Mark Otero is Not a Fan of "Play-to-Earn" Games
entry.summary: "Each game is a miracle," says Azra Games CEO Mark Otero. In this clip, he shares his thoughts on "play-to-earn" games and gamer motivation with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: How Many Games Are Building On Solana? The Answer Might Surprise You
entry.summary: Solana Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the current state of Solana's Web3 gaming ecosystem.

entry.title: Problems With Being an 'On-Chain Purist' in Gaming
entry.summary: InfiniGods Cofounders Owen O'Donoghue and Damon Gura keep it real with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, sharing thoughts on game balancing and what to do when in-game assets become NFTs.

entry.title: Why Solana Won't Become A Web3 Game Publisher
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Solana's "build together" approach as well as his thoughts on crypto firms becoming game publishers.
